surfTheWave.title: Surf the Wave
surfTheWave.reminder: Remember: Primary emotions typically last only 90 seconds. Everything else is rumination.

steps.text: Identify: Notice and label the specific emotion
Acknowledge: This is normal and temporary
Breathe: Use deep breathing to stay grounded
Allow: Let it rise and naturally subside
